name: De Olifant Die Mieren Eet
description:
In De Olifant Die Mieren Eet you play a mythical monster who strikes fear upon a small village. Their fear fuels you! You are big and powerful! Well, at least at night you are... 

Who figured that you are not as scary in the daylight. The villagers even dare to hunt you down. Their courage makes you weak and fragile so you have to hide in the daytime to hunt at night. Destroying the place give you fewer places to hide. 

It's kill or be killed and you're ready to fight.
